name: What if Instagram was built with Google's Material Design?
description:
Turns out... It looks a lot alike.

Couple of changes to the menu that I think are postive for first time users. (i.e. What's that heart icons again? oh, thats my notificaions? not a bell or something?")


Google's icons are visually heavy and draw your eye away from the posted images. Can see why instagram designers are using outlined icons to bring down the visual wieght.
